transcript: I have not had a very good experience with therapy and life coaching I feel like when I have those conversations I have to spend the majority of it trying to provide context around whatever situation I'm thinking through typically in those types of relationships the incentives aren't on line like their incentives for me to keep coming back and paying them my incentive is to be done with this and so the only person who can have absolute context and absolute alignment for you is you I remember seeing this quote once I was like if you follow your advice your own advice you'd already be way further than you currently are and I thought about that and I was like yeah I don't think I need to follow anyone else's advice I think I should be doing the things I already know I should be doing
